items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. items.content_html: A fullstack application based on JS technologies. React with ui libraries for frontend and Node for backend. Server has the architecture of microservices using routing. The front uses powerful custom hooks, memo, caching and advance lightweight routing with dynamic path + location
